item.description: We will meet off of 146 Northbridge Purgatory Chasm exit. Take a left off of exit and The Icecream Stand is up ahead on the right. This is a Dog Meet-Up and Maria's Photography Meet-Up all in one. Minature golf is here too. We had alot of fun last time so come along and bring your friendly dogs and don't forget your camera! If you want pack a lunch or just have icecream!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Purgatory Chasm-Icecream-Doggies-Photography
